PVRTexture.h File Reference

Contains methods concerning basic CPVRTexture creation, saving and data duplication. This is the main class for PVRTexLib. More...

class  pvrtexture::CPVRTexture

Detailed Description

Contains methods concerning basic CPVRTexture creation, saving and data duplication. This is the main class for PVRTexLib.
